full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BSANG CHU BSGRUB LUGS MDOR BSDUS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(BSANG CHU BSGRUB LUGS MDOR BSDUS PA 'DI NI DON GNYER CAN 'GA' ZHIG GIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, SBRANG BTZUN SNYONS LAS PA NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN GYIS MTSAN @007B LDAN PA'I GSUNG RGYUN LTAR MTSO BDUN GYI LHA KHANG CHEN MOR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI SDOM BRTZON CHOS LA MOS SHING RNAM DKAR YI BYA BA LA SPRO BA'I LHAG BSAM DGE BA CAN DGE SLONG GRAGS PA'O, ,)
